name: SSRSDeploy
description: Deploy a SQL Server Report Project to the server
author: avdbrink

inputs.name: Project
inputs.label: Project, Solution or Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Provide the .rptproj file containing the project to be deployed
Provide the .sln file if you have a solution to deploy
Provide a folder to be searched for report projects.

inputs.name: Configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the configuration as defined in VS NOTE: Even is OverWriteProjectConfiguration is set to true, this value has to be set for the right bin folder to be picked

inputs.name: OverwriteProjectConfiguration
inputs.label: Overwrite project config
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true (default): all configuration values from this page will be used. If false: all configuration values from the Report project will be used. EXCEPTION: The OutputPath variable from the project wil be used to locate the binaries, even if this value is true.

inputs.name: TargetServerURL
inputs.label: Server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Report Server name like, http://machinename/reportserver. Specifying http://localhost/reportserver will connect to the Default SQL Server instance on the machine.

inputs.name: TargetFolder
inputs.label: Target folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the folder the report should be deployed to

inputs.name: DataSourceFolder
inputs.label: DataSource folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the folder the datasources should be deployed to

inputs.name: DataSetFolder
inputs.label: Dataset folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the folder the datasets should be deployed to

inputs.name: OverwriteDataSources
inputs.label: Overwrite DataSources
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to deploy datasources even if they are already there on the target server.

inputs.name: OverwriteDatasets
inputs.label: Overwrite Datasets
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to deploy datasets even if they are already there on the target server.

inputs.name: CreateSubfolders
inputs.label: Create subfolder if multiple reports
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked a subfolder will be created for deployed projects if they contain more than 1 report file (*.rdl). If only one report file is found no subfolder will be created. The name of the  subfolder will be the same as the name of the reporting project. This will be done on a per project base.
